co.cask.cdap.api.mapreduce

Class AbstractMapReduce

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.cask.cdap.internal.api.AbstractProgramDatasetConfigurable
      • co.cask.cdap.internal.api.AbstractPluginConfigurable<MapReduceConfigurer>
        • co.cask.cdap.api.mapreduce.AbstractMapReduce
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MapReduce

    public abstract class AbstractMapReduce
extends co.cask.cdap.internal.api.AbstractPluginConfigurable<MapReduceConfigurer>
implements MapReduce
    This abstract class provides a default implementation of MapReduce methods for easy extension.

      • useStreamInput

        protected final void useStreamInput(String stream,
                  long startTime,
                  long endTime)
        Uses Stream as input for the MapReduce with specific time range. Same as calling setInputStream(new StreamBatchReadable(stream, startTime, endTime)).
        See Also:
        StreamBatchReadable

      • useStreamInput

        protected final void useStreamInput(StreamBatchReadable streamBatchReadable)
        Uses Stream as input for the MapReduce.
        See Also:
        StreamBatchReadable

      • setOutputDataset

        @Deprecated
protected final void setOutputDataset(String dataset)
        Deprecated. 
        Sets the name of the Dataset used as output for the MapReduce. Deprecated as of 3.2.0. Use MapReduceContext.addOutput(String datasetName) in beforeSubmit(co.cask.cdap.api.mapreduce.MapReduceContext), instead.

      • beforeSubmit

        public void beforeSubmit(MapReduceContext context)
                  throws Exception
        Description copied from interface: MapReduce
        Invoked before starting a MapReduce job.

        Users can access and modify the job configuration via MapReduceContext.getHadoopJob(), which returns an instance of org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Job.

        Specified by:
        beforeSubmit in interface MapReduce
        Parameters:
        context - job execution context
        Throws:
        Exception - if there's an error during this method invocation

      • onFinish

        public void onFinish(boolean succeeded,
            MapReduceContext context)
              throws Exception
        Description copied from interface: MapReduce
        Invoked after a MapReduce job finishes.

        Will not be called if:

        • Job failed to start

        Specified by:
        onFinish in interface MapReduce
        Parameters:
        succeeded - defines the result of job execution: true if job succeeded, false otherwise
        context - job execution context
        Throws:
        Exception - if there's an error during this method invocation.
